name: Archers Kingdom
description:
you have a kingdom which represented as a red cube(because I'm too lazy to draw it), and your enemy is a shapes kingdom which represented as yellow cube(for the same reason) and your enemy wants to conquer  your kingdom (obviously) so you must build archer towers to save your kingdom from the shapes

*this game is in development and this is the first demo version so it has just 4 levels but I will make more soon in the future*

controlls:

WASD : for moving the camera(but the camera must be zoomed in)

Mouse Scroll: for zooming in and out

E: to hide/show the tower store(where you select towers)

ESC: to pause the game or go to the previous screen

hint: select a tower from tower store then click twice on any ground tile to build a tower on it

art, code, soundtracks,SFX all belongs to me (yes I went into making all of these just to make a stupid game LOL)
